description: Borrowed from Yiddish קלעזמער‎ (klezmer), from Hebrew כְּלֵי זֶמֶר‎ (kléy zémer, “musical instruments”).

nouns.description: klezmer (countable and uncountable, plural klezmers or klezmorim)

entries.meaning: (music, uncountable) A type of popular Jewish folk music especially associated with Ashkenazi cultures.
